cover-slide-01.title: Developer Tools for non-Developers
cover-slide-01.author: Bob Fornal
cover-slide-01.bio1:
Entrepreneur
Code-squid provides solid, in-depth frontend training that is supported with real-world code projects. Blessed husband and proud father of two.
cover-slide-01.bio2:
Senior Solutions Developer
Leading EDJE, Inc.
Passionate about learning, testing, mentoring, speaking, and personal growth.
cover-slide-01.notes: This presentation was created after working with several business and UI/UX that were not able to properly report about issues that they were seeing.

docking--slide.title: Docking
docking--slide.text1:
To open ...
  • F12
  • RIGHT-CLICK > Inspect
  • Menu > More Tools > Dev Tools
Docking ...
  • Undock into separate window
  • Dock to left
  • Dock to bottom
  • Dock to right
docking--slide.notes: This is about "docking" the developer tools. There are several ways to dock; each with it's own use-case.

reading-error-messages--slide.title: Reading Error Messages
reading-error-messages--slide.notes:
Reading error messages should be pretty straight forward. Screenshots are useful in some cases.

Normal
When run, this code identified the line that the issue occurs on and basic information.
RUN THIS CODE.

Mangled
This code is more challenging; column is more important than the line the issue is on.
  • A few large lines.
  • Variables are simplified.
  • Function names are simplified.
RUN THIS CODE.

xhr-versus-preflight--slide.title: XHR versus Preflight
xhr-versus-preflight--slide.notes:
Preflight requests are often run by the browser, on the browser. XHR are the actual calls - sometimes blocked by the browser Preflight checks.
RUN THIS CODE - SHOW NETWORK.

copying-data-after-load--slide.title: Copying Data after Data Load
copying-data-after-load--slide.notes:
Copying data after loading.
  1. Right-Click > Store as Global Variable (Network, Console, Elements)
  2. copy(temp1)

size-and-frequency-of-data--slide.title: Size and Frequency of Data
size-and-frequency-of-data--slide.notes:
Show Network Tab with "Disable cache" checked. Identify how larger sized files "hide" in the dataset.
RUN THIS CODE.

reading-compiled-code--breakpoints--slid.title: Reading Compiled Code / Breakpoints
reading-compiled-code--breakpoints--slid.notes:
In the Sources Tab, look up ...
  1. top
  2. localhost:4200 or URL
  3. assets
  4. developer-tools-for-non-developers
  5. codee-004
  6. mangled.min.js
Examine code compared to unmangled view and how breakpoints can be inserted.
RUN THIS CODE.

console-and-data-in-time--slide.title: Console and Data-In-Time
console-and-data-in-time--slide.notes:
Objects that are consoled can show the last good value unless steps are taken to ensure point-in-time values.

Run this code and view in the actual console. Expand the first value.

Run the adjusted code and see the difference.

storage--slide.title: Storage
storage--slide.text1:
Application

LocalStorage
localStorage allows for stored key/value paris; the stored data is saved across browser sessions.
Limited to 10MB.

sessionStorage
Data in sessionStorage is cleared when the page session ends.
Limited to 5MB.

IndexedDB (not IndexDB)
IndexedDB is a way to persistently store data inside a user's browser. It is an object-oriented database.
Limited by disk space.

Cookies
Cookies are data, stored in small text files on the computer.
Limited to ~50 to ~180 at 4K.
storage--slide.notes: Knowing what storage is available and what exists there can be important.

styles--slide.title: Styles / Styling
styles--slide.text1:
• Changing color "type" (SHIFT + CLICK on the box) - Color Format
  • Changing color "displayed" (CLICK on the box) - Actual Color
styles--slide.notes:
Open the Dev Tools ...

Change color of this text; identify how to change the "Color Format" using SHIFT-CLICK on the color box.

overrides--slide.title: Code Overrides
overrides--slide.notes:
In the Developer Tools, select Sources ...
(RUN THIS CODE FIRST)
  1. (Page)
  2. top
  3. localhost:4200 or URL
  4. developer-tools-for-non-developers
  5. Right-Click "object-handler.js"
  6. Select "Override Content" (may need to select folder and allow)
  7. Change the file
  8. Mac-S or CTRL-S
(REFRESH TO SEE OVERRIDES).
  1. Developer Tools
  2. Sources
  3. Overrides
  4. CLEAR
(REFRESH TO SEE OVERRIDES CLEARED).
